text: piṉṉar, kiyāma nāḷil avaṉ avarkaḷai iḻivu paṭuttuvāṉ; "evarkaḷai nīṅkaḷ eṉakku iṇaiyā(ṉa teyvaṅkaḷā)kki, avarkaḷaippaṟṟi (muḥmiṉkaḷiṭam) piṇaṅkik koṇṭiruntīrkaḷō, avarkaḷ eṅkē?" Eṉa (avarkaḷiṭam) kēṭpāṉ; evarkaḷukkuk kalviyaṟivu koṭukkappaṭṭatō avarkaḷ; "niccayamāka iṉṟu iḻivum vētaṉaiyum kāḥpirkaḷ mītu tāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟuvārkaḷ
